name: The Other Cemetery
description:
The Other Cemetery is a small, narrative focused game set in the made-up town of Willowstead. Players will be given the opportunity to explore, interact with npc's, learn about the horrible fate of past townsfolk and uncover the town's  dark secret.

Beta

Beta 1 showcases a small sliver of the entire story, along with most of the features that will be available at full release, for free.

Availability

The game is available immediately for play on Windows and Linux.  A osx version may be available at a later date but with limited support. Note, the linux version does require the user to install love2d version 11.x.

Feedback is most welcome, good or bad.

Known Issues
  • Background video's in menu's may be choppy depending on your setup. Will be looking into a fix.
  • Two doors may display text that it's locked, but the player may still enter regardless.
